name: crypto
description: Cross-platform crypto library with support of : Aes, BCrypt, BlowFish, Des, TripleDes, TwoFish, Hmac, Pbkdf2, Ripemd160, Sha224, Sha256, Sha384, Sha512, Salsa20, XSalsa, ChaCha, SCrypt, RC4. Block cipher mode of operation:  cbc, cfb, ctr, ecb, ofb, pcbc
releasenote: Better performance for block cipher mode of operations
